languages.text: {n}В глазах служителей разгорается незримое пламя.{/n} "Кровавая паутина не забудет сказанных слов, Домин'{name}. Ибо в них звучит мудрость нашей стези. Ибо они скрепляют наш долг".
{n}The eyes of the cultists burn bright with righteous fervour.{/n} "The Bloodspun Web will not forget your words, Domin'{name}. They are the wisdom of the Tenets and the benediction of our duty."
languages.original_text: {n}В глазах служителей разгорается незримое пламя.{/n} "Кровавая паутина не забудет сказанных слов, Домин'{name}. Ибо в них звучит мудрость нашей стези. Ибо они скрепляют наш долг".

traits.locale_text: {n}An invisible flame lights up in the cultists' eyes.{/n} "The Bloodspun Web will not forget the words that were spoken, Enim'{name}. For they resonated with the wisdom of our Way. For they sealed our duty."

{n}An invisible flame lights up in the cultists' eyes.{/n} "The Bloodspun Web will not forget the words that were spoken, Enim'{name}. For they resonated with the wisdom of our Way. For they sealed our duty."
{n}The eyes of the cultists burn bright with righteous fervour.{/n} "The Bloodspun Web will not forget your words, Enim'{name}. They are the wisdom of Ahn'shini and the benediction of our duty."

{n}The eyes of the cultists burn bright with righteous fervour.{/n} "The Bloodspun Web will not forget your words, Domin'{name}. They are the wisdom of the Tenets and the benediction of our duty."
{n}The eyes of the cultists burn bright with righteous fervour.{/n} "The Bloodspun Web will not forget your words, Domin'{name}. They are the wisdom of the Tenets and the benediction of our duty."

languages.text: {n}Le regard des cultistes s'illumine d'une ferveur vertueuse.{/n} « La Toile de Sang n'oubliera pas vos paroles, Domin'{name}. Elles reflètent la sagesse des Préceptes et la bénédiction qu'est notre devoir. »
languages.original_text: {n}The eyes of the cultists burn bright with righteous fervour.{/n} "The Bloodspun Web will not forget your words, Domin'{name}. They are the wisdom of the Tenets and the benediction of our duty."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard des cultistes s'illumine d'une ferveur vertueuse.{/n} « La Toile de Sang n'oubliera pas vos paroles, Domin'{name}. Elles reflètent la sagesse des Préceptes et la bénédiction qu'est notre devoir. »

languages.text: {n}Los ojos de los cultistas arden con fervor devoto.{/n} «La Red Sanguinolenta no olvidará sus palabras, Domin'{name}. Son la sabiduría de la Doctrina y la bendición de nuestro deber».
languages.original_text: {n}The eyes of the cultists burn bright with righteous fervour.{/n} "The Bloodspun Web will not forget your words, Domin'{name}. They are the wisdom of the Tenets and the benediction of our duty."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos de los cultistas arden con fervor devoto.{/n} «La Red Sanguinolenta no olvidará sus palabras, Domin'{name}. Son la sabiduría de la Doctrina y la bendición de nuestro deber».

languages.text: {n}所有信徒的目光中闪烁着正义的狂热。{/n}“织血罗网不会忘记你的话语，秘者{name}。你的话语蕴含着教义的智慧，为我们的使命带来恩赐。”
languages.original_text: {n}The eyes of the cultists burn bright with righteous fervour.{/n} "The Bloodspun Web will not forget your words, Domin'{name}. They are the wisdom of the Tenets and the benediction of our duty."

traits.locale_text: {n}所有信徒的目光中闪烁着正义的狂热。{/n}“织血罗网不会忘记你的话语，秘者{name}。你的话语蕴含着教义的智慧，为我们的使命带来恩赐。”

languages.text: {n}魔女団たちの目が、正義の熱情に燃えている。{/n}「ブラッドスパン・ウェブはあなたの言葉を忘れない、ドミン・{name}。それらは教義の知恵であり、我々の義務の恩恵であります」
languages.original_text: {n}The eyes of the cultists burn bright with righteous fervour.{/n} "The Bloodspun Web will not forget your words, Domin'{name}. They are the wisdom of the Tenets and the benediction of our duty."

traits.locale_text: {n}魔女団たちの目が、正義の熱情に燃えている。{/n}「ブラッドスパン・ウェブはあなたの言葉を忘れない、ドミン・{name}。それらは教義の知恵であり、我々の義務の恩恵であります」

languages.text: {n}In den Augen der Kultisten brennt rechtschaffener Eifer.{/n} "Das Blutgesponnene Netz wird Eure Worte nicht vergessen, Domin'{name}. Sie sind die Weisheit der Grundsätze und die Segnung unserer Pflicht."
languages.original_text: {n}The eyes of the cultists burn bright with righteous fervour.{/n} "The Bloodspun Web will not forget your words, Domin'{name}. They are the wisdom of the Tenets and the benediction of our duty."

languages.text: {n}Tarikatçıların gözleri, erdemli bir hararetle ışıldıyor.{/n} "Kanipi Ağı, bu sözlerini unutmayacak Domin'{name}. İlkelerin bize öğrettiği hikmet ve vazifemizin gereği budur."
languages.original_text: {n}The eyes of the cultists burn bright with righteous fervour.{/n} "The Bloodspun Web will not forget your words, Domin'{name}. They are the wisdom of the Tenets and the benediction of our duty."
